name: mechanization
content:

the process of introducing a machine to do something that used to be done by hand: The decline in farm population was caused by increased mechanization of agriculture. The early phases of the Industrial Revolution were closely linked to the mechanization of the textile industry. See
mechanize
More examplesFewer examplesThe mechanization of cotton production increased the cost of machinery.There is a trend towards increasing farm mechanization in the region.Because of increasing mechanization, the agricultural workforce diminished by about 60 percent.
